name: The Grudge of the Ring
description:
Trapped in a school overtaken by outlandish demons, you have to fight for survival. Use your hands to defeat the seemingly endless hordes of maniacal spirits.

Survive as long as you can. Your hands are your only weapons. Shoot with Right / Left mouse buttons. Move with WASD. I think you have to pick up ammo as well. Maybe. That's probably the spookiest thing!

NOTES:

This is not a finished game and therefore there will be huge amounts of (possibly game breaking) bugs. We hope you enjoy them.

Head bob turned out to be framerate dependent, so if you get motion sickness, blame your fat rig! This may or may not be fixed in the future.

Made for OMG Jam 5 by GDQ ( https://itch.io/jam/omgjam5 ) November 2018.
